metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14721 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.7 might allow remote attackers to conduct server-side request forgery (SSRF) attacks by leveraging failure to block the axis2-jaxws class from polymorphic deserialization. It was discovered that Jackson Databind incorrectly handled deserialization. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute server-side request forgery (SSRF).

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
